name: Patisserie Academy
description:
Hello my sweeties~ 

Welcome to your stay at Patisserie Academy! This is your one stop shop for sweets and tarts alike. Befriend your favorite snack and try to see if you can get under their wrapper. 

You play as an aspiring  dessert chef looking to gain the trust of 3 lucky confections into giving you their coveted recipe secrets~ 

Dodge and weave through their hard outer crust and try to be the first to find their sweet goopy center. 

Good luck to you our wonderful aspiring pâtissiers~!

-Announcer

✦  ✦  ✦

                     

  • Snacks~
  • 🍵 An Absolute Queen
  • 🍓 The Bitter Herald
  • 🥚 Mochi or an egg?
  • 3 Endings (Or forever alone~)
  • Important choices
  • Original sprites & backgrounds
  • Campy Humor
  • Minor Cursing
  • WAY TOO MANY PUNS!!~~
